data.name: Stay with Me! Alien Abduction Story
data.detailed_description:
Stay with me! is a narrative psychological horror game. Experience firsthand the damage fear can do to your mind by losing yourself alone in a series of unexplained events. As a player we embody Ana who travels on her way to her house, however she ends up getting lost on the way to experience a series of strange events that will trigger contact with aliens.



On November 1999, a young woman named Ana got lost near a mountain forest. Her whereabouts are unknown to this day. The police searched for her for many years indicating that she may have suffered an accident, likewise other indications indicate that she was murdered and that her body was hidden in the forest. However, locals speculate that her disappearance may be related to strange lights seen in the forest and in the night sky.

Assumes the role of Ana to discover her whereabouts.



As a player, you will experience the psychological terror directly from the first person perspective, you will slowly get lost in the forest, you can decide your path, but this will lead to different results. You will find obstacles that more than once will prevent you from continuing, examine the environments to be able to decide how to advance. You must be careful that if you die it will be the end of the game

data.short_description: Psychological horror game with a first person view, you will play a young woman who has lost her way and who apparently has been kidnapped by beings that are not from this world
data.supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4460, 2.70GHz or AMD FX™-6300 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 760 or AMD Radeon™ R7 260x with 2GB Video RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/30FP
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 8.1, 10 (64-BIT Required)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 3770 3.4GHz or AMD equivalent or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 with 3GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound compatible (must support DirectX® 9.0c or higher)
  • Additional Notes: Hardware specification target 1080P/60FPS.

content_descriptors.notes:
Strong lighting effects
Subjective violence
Moderate physical violence
Abduction
